ranking.title: Mobilization Frequency Ranking
ranking.description1: Display the frequency of students who won the Platinum Trophy according to the number of stars
ranking.desp_percent: Each bar length represents a ratio to the total number of mobilizations
ranking.desp_absolute: Each bar length represents the actual number of mobilizations.

heatmap.title: Student Mobilization Trends by Raid
heatmap.description1: View student mobilization trends in a heatmap format
heatmap.description2: Based on max level. Lower levels are shown as decimals. (e.g., if max level is 90 Lv., a 45 Lv. Fubuki would be counted as 45/90 = 0.5 uses)
heatmap.noDataMessage: No data to display. Please select at least one Star-value.

control.studentSearchPlaceholder: Enter student name, role, school, or squad type

home.title: BlueArhcive-JP Mobilization Trends
home.description: Visualizing mobilization trends for 'Blue Archive' JP-Server Platinum Trophy
home.js-disable-description: This page requires JavaScript. To use the website's main features, please check your browser settings and enable JavaScript.
